text: Lirim Zendeli (born 18 October 1999 in Bochum) is a German racing driver. He competed in FIA Formula 3 Championship with Charouz Racing System in 2019 as the reigning German Formula 4 champion. After the 2019 F3 season, Zendeli competed in the 2020 Toyota Racing Series in New Zealand before joining Trident for the 2020 FIA Formula 3 Championship. ==Racing career== ===ADAC Formula 4=== 2016 was Zendeli's first season in ADAC Formula 4. His only podium of the year came at Zandvoort and he finished 13th in the standings. The following season would see Zendeli improve his results by winning three races and finishing in 4th position. 2018 was his breakout year: Zendeli moved to the US Racing-CHRS team and brought home the F4 title. ===FIA Formula 3 Championship=== Zendeli progressed to Formula 3 in 2019, staying on with Charouz. He only scored six points, one less than his teammate Fabio Scherer and finished 18th in the championship.
